column5: Hello New here to the boards. I am going to Crotch Lake Ontario at the end of the month. Was wondering if anyone could point me in the right direction to purchase a descent map of the lake. Thanks in advance.

I don't think there is a good chart with depth marked-all I've sen is a fishing map with general outline of shoreline/islands and suposedly    where the fish are. PM me an email addy if you want that sent over-its not much help for navigation.
